permissions: Requires authorization to create prediction subject bids via the delegated LowestLosingBidPredictionSubjectDetail policy.
side_effects: Creates a prediction subject bid record and links it to a bidder and lowest losing bid prediction subject detail.
validation_notes: --bidder is required. --lowest-losing-bid-prediction-subject-detail is required. Amount must be greater than 0 when provided. Bidder must be unique per lowest losing bid prediction subject detail.

flags.name: --amount
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.
